markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Borrow Time](/Feats.aspx?ID=3852) <actions string="Free Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Dark Archive](/Sources.aspx?ID=129) pg. 186</row>

**Archetype** [Chronoskimmer](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=192)

**Frequency**
once per minute

**Prerequisites**
[Chronoskimmer Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3847)

**Trigger**
Your turn begins.

</column>

---

You reach ahead and make use of time that's yet to be. You become [quickened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=32) and can use the extra action to Step, Stride, or Strike. You gain this extra action immediately and can use it this turn. At the end of your turn, you become [stunned 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=36).
name: Borrow Time
